Title: Not Waste, Not Want
Description:
Everything have use, friend. Even things stoneheads throw away and think worthless.

Kobolds know better.

Go and see what you can find. Need to scavenge lots of scrap. Enough for kobold crafting of new homes!
ObjectivesText: Collect potentially useful scrap from around the Warrens.
CompletionText: You will be surprised. Kobold crafting is amazing!
RewardText:
Not bad for |5night $rs. We make good use of this.

Most of it, anyway. Sometimes, one person's trash is really just trash.
